pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extract Remote Sensing Vegetation Phenology // The merits of 'TIMESAT' and 'phenopix' are adopted. Besides, a simple and growing season dividing method and a practical snow elimination method based on Whittaker were proposed. 7 curve fitting methods and 4 phenology extraction methods were provided. Parameters boundary are considered for every curve fitting methods according to their ecological meaning. And 'optimx' is used to select best optimization method for different curve fitting methods.
